ygData.subject: RE: Re: General Tinkering Info
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you have the screenshot of the thermal cloak from the journal.  I d hate to have to buy the book again just to get it as I lost my first one to being dumped
ygData.messageBody:
Do you have the screenshot of the thermal cloak from the journal. I'd hate
to have to buy the book again just to get it as I lost my first one to being
dumped while the bag it was in was in my hand.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Jordan [mailto:kjordan@...]
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 11:37 AM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: General Tinkering Info


From: Ken Jordan <kjordan@...>

Here are the pics from the book giving the formulas for the Rebreather,
Aqualung and the Gem Cutter I believe. For some reason they took down the
formulas from the EQ Tinkering site.

http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page1-2.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page3-4.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page5-6.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page7-8.jpg

If you still have questions give me a tell in game.

Darkadvent Doombringer - Cazic Thule (Xandrea's Nemisis)



-----Original Message-----
From: Xandrea Hopebringer [mailto:Xandrea@...]
Sent: Saturday, November 13, 1999 3:20 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: General Tinkering Info


From: "Xandrea Hopebringer" <Xandrea@...>

I'm really interested in knowing what all is required to make the rebreater
and aqualung, also if there are any tinkerers who can make these on cazic
thule.
-Thank you Xandrea.
